apis_cloud: Amazon Web Services (AWS) for cloud hosting and services
health_tech: HIPAA compliance for data storage and transmission
integration_patterns: API integration with electronic health records (EHR) systems

evidence.claim: PracticePro 365 utilizes AWS for cloud hosting to ensure scalable and secure services.
The platform is HIPAA compliant, which is crucial for patient data protection in health technology.
Implementation of X12 EDI standards for health insurance claims processing is outlined on their services page.
Integration capabilities with EHR systems are emphasized in their API documentation.

icp.icp_reason: PracticePro 365 focuses on HIPAA-compliant data transactions and has integration with EHRs, indicating a need for X12 data exchange.
matched_use_cases: API integration for better data exchange
